<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>true</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_1112736_gr_nfl_c_gruenflaechenarbeiten</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>GF-Arbeit erstellen</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous) {
    // Überprüfen Sie hier Ihre Bedingungen
    if (current.field1 == 'Wert1' && current.field2 == 'Wert2') {
        // Wenn Bedingungen erfüllt sind, erstellen Sie die Grünfläche
        var gruenflaeche = new GlideRecord('gruenflaeche_table');
        gruenflaeche.initialize();
        gruenflaeche.name = current.name; // Hier Felder entsprechend kopieren
        gruenflaeche.field1 = current.field1;
        // Füllen Sie hier weitere Felder
        gruenflaeche.insert();
    }
})(current, previous);
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>claudia</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-09-07 19:46:13</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>4cf1d243478971107ec50d45d36d4361</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GF-Arbeit erstellen</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Grünflächenmanagement" source="x_1112736_gr_nfl_c">25c281b8470531107ec50d45d36d43d5</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Grünflächenmanagement">25c281b8470531107ec50d45d36d43d5</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_4cf1d243478971107ec50d45d36d4361</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>claudia</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-09-07 20:22:35</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=4cf1d243478971107ec50d45d36d4361"/></record_update>
